ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground cloves, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1   +   1/2 cups white sugar, 1 cup butter, 3  eggs, beaten, 1 cup buttermilk, 1 cup chopped fresh figs, 1 cup chopped pecans,   +   1/2 cup butter,   +   1/2 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup evaporated milk,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking soda
nutrition: Total Fat 21g 27%, Saturated Fat 11g 54%, Cholesterol 74mg 25%, Sodium 333mg 14%, Total Carbohydrate 37g 14%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 26g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 1mg 3%, Calcium 66mg 5%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 121mg 3%
